div.div: Trends in climate change (annual precipitation and annual mean temperature) in DBR and BCI.
div.p: Temperature data were unavailable for a few months in the years 1983, 1986, 1987 and 1988 for BCI. There are 5 intervals for community I of DBR (1955–1963, 1963–1967, 1967–1978, 1978–1982, and 1982–1985), two intervals for community II of DBR (1978–1982 and 1982–1985) and 5 intervals for BCI (1981–1985, 1985–1990, 1990–1995, 1995–2000, and 2000–2005).
